name: Tit Petric
body:
### Tit Petric I'm a 30-ish something application and systems developer from Slovenia. My dream job is to work at Tumblr. I like to work intelligently opposed to working hard. I love a good book, I'm a geek for sci-fi and I'm as talented for cooking as good as I am at programming. I also love taking photos and spending time with friends. I find that good friends, good wine and good food are as much as any one could ask for. I appreciate the laughs I can get. ### Links Development blog - http://foreach.org
Personal blog - http://titpetric.tumblr.com
Instagram - http://instagram.com/titpetric
Twitter - http://twitter.com/titpetric You can reach me on black@scene-si.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
